title: How A Villainess Survives As A Saint
alternative_title: 악녀가 성녀로 살아남는 방법 ; 悪女が聖女として生き残る方法
status: 악녀가 성녀로 살아남는 방법 ; 悪女が聖女として生き残る方法
description:
Description :
        "If you do good deeds in the human world for one year, you will regain all your powers.'' Ides, a supreme demon, loses a battle with her rival god, Ferdinand, and has to live as a saint in the human world. But something is not quite right. Unlike when she was a demon, Ides now has a sickly body that will collapse if she does not do a good deed. She cannot speak ill of anyone, nor can she attack humans... Then the emperor Raiden, who looks just like the god Ferdinand, appears before her. "What a cute saint.''**Links:**- (https://www.comico.jp/comic/9323)
